Ingredients.3: 3  skinless, boneless chicken thighs, cut into cubes

Ingredients.4: 1  skinless, boneless chicken breast half, cut into cubes

Ingredients.6: 1 (10.5 ounce) can condensed cream of chicken soup

Ingredients.10: 0.5 cups all-purpose baking mix (such as Bisquick®)

Directions.1: Melt butter in a large pot over medium heat. Add onions; cook and stir until they begin to soften, about 3 minutes. Add chicken; cook and stir until no longer pink in the center, about 10 minutes. Add water, condensed soup, bouillon cubes, and poultry seasoning; stir to combine. Increase the heat to medium-high and bring to a simmer.

Directions.2: Meanwhile, pour milk into a mixing bowl. Add baking mix and stir until a dough forms.

Directions.3: Drop spoonfuls of dumpling mix into simmering soup. Reduce the heat to medium-low, cover, and simmer for 10 minutes. Turn dumplings over and continue to simmer until no longer doughy in the center, about 10 more minutes.
